title.rendered: Apply Now | Bishops University Admission Requirements 2024

content.rendered:
Bishop’s University Admission Requirements, Required Documents, Supporting Documents, How to Apply, Degree Program Division.

Bishop’s University Admission is ongoing for all interested candidates who wish to apply for admission; the admission is open for all nationals.

Bishop’s University Admission Requirements is outlined below;

Admission Requirements

The following requirements should be used as a guideline to be considered competitive for admissions consideration. Each admission cycle, Bishop’s University receives more applications than the spaces available. Meeting the minimum posted requirements does not guarantee admission.

Students who have accomplished 12 years of formal schooling and received a secondary school credential that would authorize you admittance to university in that country.

  • The maximum standard required varies depending upon the core curriculum followed; records are reviewed on an individual basis. for more  kindly Contact the Admissions Office (admissions@ubishops.ca) for detailed information on your particular situation

Recognition documents.

Use the chart below to decide what document(s) you must put forward:

Status in Canada Document(s) Required
Canadian citizen born in Canada Copy of your birth certificate
Canadian citizen born outside of Canada Copy of both sides of your Canadian citizenship card or certificate
Canadian permanent resident Copy of both sides of your permanent resident card
AND a copy of your Certificat de sélection du Québec (CSQ) if you immigrated directly into Quebec
International student Copy of your valid passport

 

Required Supporting Documents: for All Applicants

  •  A Copy of receiving a letter to a Bishop’s University’s English language pathway partner program.
  •  A copy of the most recent academic record(s).
  •  A Copy of personal identification

 

Admission Requirements for a Specific Program

While consideration is given to the country-specific secondary school program followed, the following specific courses are generally necessary:

Degree Program Division:

WILLIAMS SCHOOL OF BUSINESS

  • Course necessities: Grade 11 level Mathematics

HUMANITIES

  • Course necessities: None specified

SOCIAL SCIENCES

  • Course Requirements: None specified

NATURAL SCIENCES & MATHEMATICS

  • Course necessities for B.Sc. Science programs: University-entrance Mathematics, two university-entrance Sciences (usually Biology, Chemistry, and/or Physics)
  • Course supplies for B.A. Science programs: University-entrance Mathematics

SCHOOL OF EDUCATION – elementary and secondary

  • Course Requirements: not precise

SCHOOL OF EDUCATION – math or science as a teachable

  • Course necessities: University-entrance Mathematics, two university-entrance Sciences (usually Biology, Chemistry, or Physics)

Steps to apply for admission

  • Click here to fill in the online admission application form
  • Fill in the appropriate information
  • And lastly, click on ‘Submit Application.

For further information visit admissions@ubishops.ca
